name: Scene of the Crime
text:
Play only as your first action.
Discover 1 clue at your location (2 clues instead if there is an enemy at that location). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Marksmanship
text:
Fast. Play when you activate the Fight ability on a Firearm or Ranged asset.
This attack can target an enemy at a connecting location. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack. If this attack succeeds against an enemy not engaged with you, the attack deals +1 damage.

name: Persuasion
text: Parley. Choose a non-weakness Humanoid enemy at your location and test [intellect] (3). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is that enemy's horror value. If you succeed, shuffle the chosen enemy into the encounter deck. If the chosen enemy is Elite, automatically evade it instead.

name: Analyse Astucieuse
text: Permanent. Limité à 1 par deck. Lorsque vous améliorez une carte avec le trait (Non-identifié) ou (Non-traduit), vous pouvez amélioré une seconde copie de cette carte sans payer son coût en expérience. Si vous le faites, les deux versions des cartes améliorés sont choisies au hasard parmi les cartes éligibles. (Vous devez suivre les restrictions de constructions de deck)

flavor: "It’s not really all that lucky. Just in the mood for a smoke."
name: Lucky Cigarette Case
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Lucky Cigarette Case: Draw 1 card.

flavor: "Don’t worry. I know a guy." – Leo De Luca
name: Fence
text: [reaction] When you play an Illicit card during your turn, exhaust Fence: The Illicit card gains fast. If it was already fast, reduce its cost by 1 instead.

name: Recherche des Arcanes
text: Permanent. Quand vous achetez Recherche des Arcanes, subissez 1 trauma mental. Après chaque scénario d'une campagne, réduisez le coût en expérience de la première carte Sort que vous améliorez de 1.

name: Counterspell
text:
Fast. Play when a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] chaos token is revealed during a skill test at your location.
Cancel that chaos token.

flavor: Calloused hands and a determined heart were all she needed.
name: Perseverance
text:
Fast. Play when you are assigned damage and/or horror that would defeat you.
Cancel up to 4 of that damage and/or horror.

name: Stunning Blow
text: If this skill test is successful during an attack, automatically evade the attacked enemy.
